machine_start_gcode.default_value:
; Two Trees Sapphire Plus Custom Start GCode
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ; Heat up the buildplate
M104 S100 ; Preheat the hotend
M105 ;report Temperatures

; M280 P0 S160 ; BLTouch alarm release
; G4 P100 ; delay for BLTouch
G28 X Y ; home X Y
G0 X155 Y155 F10000 ; position head in the center
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ; wait for buildplate temperature settle down
M104 S{material_initial_print_temperature} ; heat up the hotend for printing
G28 Z ; home Z
G0 X0 Y0 F10000 ; position head in the front corner
M109 S{material_initial_print_temperature} ; wait for hotend temperature settle down
G92 E0 ; zero extruder
G1 E10 F150 ; extract 10mm filament for priming the nozzle
G1 E8 F1200 ; retract 2mm
; M420 S; Activate Bed Leveling Mesh

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
; Sapphire Plus Custom End GCode
M400
M300 S440 P100 ;play finish tone
G0 Z230 F1200;Bed Down
G0 X0 Y0 ;park the head
G92 E0 ;zero extruder
M104 S0 ;turn nozzle off
M140 S0 ;turn bed off
M84 ;switch steppers off
M107 ;switch fan off
